page.title: 11BELLERBY C.E. PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {THE SCHOOL__}The school was founded in 1832 by Francis Walker, gentleman. He collected subscriptions from local people and gave the land for the building of a school and school house. The actual cost of the building was Â£15 14s.10d. In 1871 a porch was added and another classroom was built on in 1891. The school house is now a private home. In July 1985 the school closed and plans for the future of the building are under discussion. The pupils will attend the County Primary School in Leyburn from September 1985. An exhibition to mark the closure of the school was held on July 6th.__See page 17{BELLERBY SCHOOL EXHIBITION.}
